ValkyrieEditorSettings._comment_AllowedGatherFolders: Allowed folders to gather assets from when exposing assets
ValkyrieEditorSettings._comment_AllowedClasses1: List of all classes and structs exposed to UEFN, which means they are allowed to be referenced directly by user-created assets and actors.
ValkyrieEditorSettings._comment_AllowedClasses2: Classes marked with Visible: true will appear in class pickers such as for Blueprint parent classes, UClass* FProperties, etc.
ValkyrieEditorSettings._comment_AllowedClasses3: Note: All Blueprints must be listed in FortExposedAssetLists. BPs should only be listed here if they are subclassable (Visible:true), but must still go in a FortExposedAssetList.
